name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon: Complete Edition
summary: Have you ever wondered what it’s like to run your own breakfast kitchen? In Breakfast Bar Tycoon, you'll learn that it's no easy task! You will take on the role of a breakfast bar manager and try your best to serve the hordes of hungry customers as quickly as possible. Take orders, prepare dishes and fight for tips! Invest your earnings into upgrading your restaurant and become a breakfast magnate!
